title: Corrie Star Julia Goulding looks ready to pop as she shows off her blossoming bump
text:

Julia Goulding looked ready to pop as she posed for snaps at The Baby Show at London's Olympia on Saturday afternoon.

The Coronation Street star, 34, appeared to be glowing as she showed off her blossoming baby bump at the star-studded parenting and baby event.

Julia happily posed with her growing bump and looked effortlessly stylish in a casual striped T-shirt and black jeans.

(Image: Sue Andrews / SplashNews.com)

The soap star, who is expecting her first child with husband Ben Silver, got stuck into testing out the pushchairs at the event, ahead of her new arrival.

Wearing her glossy brunette locks in a natural loose style, Julia opted for minimal make-up to highlight her stunning pregnancy glow.

Over the weekend, fellow mums-to-be - Big Brother star Casey Batchelor , pro dancer Ola Jordan , reality T guru Nadia Essex and former S Club 7 star Hannah Spearritt also attended the parenting and baby event.

(Image: Sue Andrews / SplashNews.com)

(Image: Sue Andrews / SplashNews.com)

Julia announced the news of her bundle of joy back in May, just months after her and Ben tied the knot.

She excitedly revealed to her Instagram followers: "Ben and I are delighted to announce that we are expecting our first baby at the end of this year!

"We are absolutely overjoyed and can’t wait to meet our little one!"

(Image: Sue Andrews / SplashNews.com)

(Image: Sue Andrews / SplashNews.com)

Julia, who is the on-screen lover of Jack P Shepherd's character David Platt, is expected to take four months maternity leave from Coronation Street.

In recent Corrie episodes, a riot breaks out at the prison where David is currently serving his sentence and as he becomes the main suspect, Shona is left horrified.

(Image: Sue Andrews / SplashNews.com)

Shona has been caring for her fiancé David's children Max and Lily since he was banged up behind bars earlier this year for his part in stealing from grandmother Audrey.

As Julia prepares to take her maternity leave from the show, Shona Ramsey's exit plot is yet to be revealed.

Coronation Street airs Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays at 7.30pm and 8.30pm on ITV.
description: The actress, who plays Shona Ramsey in the ITV soap, is expecting her first child with husband Ben Silver
